div.div:
The Board of Education of the Amityville Union Free School District will hold a Special Remote Meeting on Tuesday, April 28, 2020 commencing at 7:30 P.M. As authorized by Executive Order No. 202.1, signed by Governor Cuomo on March 12, 2020, the meeting will be held remotely and the public will not be permitted to attend the meeting in-person. The public will be able to listen to the public session by viewing our website amityvilleschools.org on April 28, 2020 at 7:30 PM. If you have any questions about accessing the meeting remotely, you can contact the District Clerk, Barbara Miller, at bmiller@amityvilleufsd.org. It is anticipated that the public participation portion of the meeting will be suspended.
The agenda(s) in whole or in part for the meeting(s) will be available the morning of the meeting on the district website @www.amityvilleufsd.org under the tab Board of Education/BoardDocs.
